detailsOfAchievement: MAJOR ACTIVITIES. RCHSS started its work with environmental activities. Planting trees with students in and around 40 villages in the year 1987to1992 and continues till date. From the year 1887 RCHSS started to organize and maintain SHGs in holistic way. RCHSS implemented the nutrition and health program with the kind help from USAID/CRS/Agriculture Ministry,GOI till 2002 among tribal and othersegment of the community. RCHSS implemented the RCH program in1994 under Rolling Fund scheme of Government of India through CINI. RCHSS started to work with local PRIs to facilitate the pro-poo policy of the governments. RCHSS started to implement innovative family welfare scheme with the financial support from the government under SCOVA committee. RCHSS started to implement health and nutrition program with CARE and continued upto June, 2009. RCHSS implemented a program to help and support the girls to continue their education and avoid the hazards of early marriage with the support from MISEREOR. RCHSS implemented a programme to enhance the health condition of the tribal mass with the support from MEMISA/CORDAID. RCHSS started to implement program to preserve and enhance organic farming and continuing. RCHSS facilitated thr Action Research by the University of Keel,SIPRD-WB and DFID on pro-poor governance. RCHSS started to implement Mother NGO scheme as a FNGO to address the RCH problems. RCHSS implemented ISM & H scheme under H&FW,GOI. RCHSS facilitated the micro planning of a local government area to support the preparation of Human Development Report of the district Malda under the department of Development and planning ,WB. RCHSS implemented a poverty eliviation programme in 9 GPs of the district with CASA/BFW. RCHSS became MNGO for Malda district under MNGO scheme of the department of Health and Family Welfare. Also started the hand holding and training support to ASHAs of the district Malda. RCHSS started an anti trafficking programme in the district of Darjeeling. RCHSS started to implement SILK CLUSTER DEVELOPMENT programme with NABARD & NISIET,Hyderabad. RCHSS started to implement financial inclusion programme by organising SHGs and linking them with Financial Institutions with NABARD. RCHSS started to implement quality and inclusive education programme with SCF/EU in 50 brick kilns of Malda district. RCHSS started to implement an advocacy programme to support ongoing SSA in the district. RCHSS each and every year accommodating students from various parts of the world including foreign universities and IRMA like management institutes for sharing and cross learning the experiences. RCHSS supported 2 local researches on Micro insurance and Climate Change. MAJOR ACHIEVEMENT. RCHSS able to facilitate near about 80,000 families to move through self initiative with self esteem to establish their own power structures. Communities enhanced towards mobilizing existing human and natural resources for self sustenance. Communities able to establish and raise government resources effectively. Enhanced the knowledge base of people with indigenous and appropriate technical knowledge.

isuues.value: Children,Education & Literacy,Health & Family Welfare,Micro Finance (SHGs),Nutrition,Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation,Tourism,Vocational Training,Women's Development & Empowerment

detailsOfAchievement: Riddhi Centre For Studies & Development is a voluntary social service organization engaged in the development of women and children belonging to the disadvantaged section of the community. The mission of Riddhi is to promote health, education & economic self-dependance for the hapless victims of unfair social order. The integration of the concern for the wellbeing of women & children into the development agenda is not a new phenomenon. Yet the picture is still very dismal. Cognizant of this fact, a miniscule group of perseverant women teachers of various colleges & schools in Kolkata took the concerted initiative to formally establish â€˜Riddhiâ€™. Its genesis goes back to 1998. Ever since, it has been working assiduously in the direction of realizing its avowed mission. In the area of health, Riddhisâ€™ concern spans the provision of comprehensive, affordable & quality health care to women & children. With this end is view, it seeks to organize regular health checkup , distribution of medicine, deliver prenatal & post natal services to pregnant & lactating women, ensure regular immunization for children & proliferate nutrition & health education data as widely as possible. First it started it services at Bagbazar area of Kolkata with permission of Kolkata Municipal Corporation which was later shifted to Birbhum District of W. B. for improvement of Reproductive & Child Health (RCH). Riddhi has launched it services in Saithia Block of Birbhum in two phases, each consisting of five villages with a population coving over 2500 people. Children have manifold needs starting form health, nutrition, protection, education & recreation. Riddhi is committed to safeguard the rights of children. To increase the enrollment & retention rate of children at schools, Riddhi emphasized the need to strengthen preschool education. Running of preprimary school in the slum areas of Kolkata as well as in rural Bengal for children for their eventual admission to primary schools, organizing programmes aimed at providing recreational facilities as well as carrying on remedial coaching classes for retention of students at schools are the highlights of Riddhisâ€™ agenda in education sector. Economic self-sufficiency & empowerment through sustained employment is perhaps the most efficacious means of social empowerment. Riddhisâ€™ service in this area include the organization of vocational training programme to develop income generating skills & the provision of help to rural women in forming selp-help groups for micro enterprise, entrepreneurship development & securing micro credit. Birbhum District Rural Development Cell has assigned Saithia Block to Riddhi for the promotion of Swarnajayanti Gram Swarojgar Yogona where 217 self-help groups were created. Riddhi aims at convergence of services that is adult literacy, health awareness building & capacity building of women. Riddhi has been appointed by the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India as an implementing agency for capacity building of service providers with an aim to develop sustainable rural tourism at Antpur, Hoogly District of West Bengal. During the span of its existence the ambit of Riddhis activity has widened & the range of its services has registered a study growth.

detailsOfAchievement: Roopdarshan was founded in 1987 with the objective of enacting of plays of social awareness. In theses 27 years, we have staged as many as 11 numbers of full acts and 3 short plays of social relevance. We staged plays of reputed playwright and writer like Badal Sarkar, Sunil Gangopadhyay and Ujjal Chattopadhyay. They had come to see their own creation staged by us and appreciated to the full extent. But achievement of a voluntary group like us should not be judged only on account of the reasons cited above. Truly, this should be judged by the hard effort put by us for serious theatre for promoting awareness of moral values and social responsibility among the mass. Only we can add that while doing so, we had the achievement to the fact that we could associate eminent theatre personalities like Tapas Sen, Joy Sen, Murari Roy Chowdhury, Shyamal Chakrabarty, who from time to time acted as our light designer, music director and drama director. Our short plays â€œBikram O Adalatâ€ got 1st prize in many one act competition held in West Bengal. Our satire play â€œCorner Plotâ€ acclaimed by the critics and audience as one of the best comedy plays produced in this state.

detailsOfAchievement: Placed Tubs in different areas with water to provide clean drinking water for animals and birds. Arranged awareness programmes in the same areas and form group who will look after the refilling of the Tubs to continue the supply of the fresh water. RCEM monitors the process time to time. Cleaning of the drains in the same areas also provides drinking water to the animals. Castration of Dogs after their first litter. Given anti-rabies injection. Diet consoling for mothers and children. Diet and health consoling of would be mothers to ensure safe motherhood and children. Initiative to spread awareness among the people to adopt India dogs. Adoption of reached animals to suitable families by interest. Awareness programmes to stop the use of polythene bags and promote use of biodegradable alternative (like jute bags). Awareness camps to prevent draping of refuse in local water bodies by seminars and street plays.
